q: Which layer of the medallion architecture is most commonly used by data analysts?
opts: Dashboards
Gold
Bronze
Silver
q_zh: 数据分析师最常使用的是奖章架构（Medallion Architecture）的哪一层？
exp_zh: 数据分析师主要查询 Gold（金）层，因为该层包含高度聚合和业务级别的结构化数据，专为报告和仪表板优化。

q: A data analyst has recently joined a new team that uses Databricks SQL, but the analyst has never used Databricks before. The analyst wants to know where in Databricks SQL they can write and execute SQL queries. Where can the analyst write and execute SQL queries?
opts: Data page
Dashboards page
Queries page
SQL Editor page
q_zh: 一位数据分析师刚加入一个使用Databricks SQL的新团队，但该分析师从未使用过Databricks。分析师想知道在Databricks SQL中可以在哪里编写和执行SQL查询。
exp_zh: 在Databricks SQL中，编写和执行SQL查询的主要地方是SQL Editor页面。

q: How should Databricks SQL be used in relation to other business intelligence (BI) tools like Tableau, Power BI, and Looker?
opts: As a complementary tool for quick in-platform BI work
As a complete replacement with additional functionality
As an exact substitute with the same level of functionality
As a complementary tool for professional-grade presentations
q_zh: 与其他商业智能（BI）工具（如Tableau、Power BI和Looker）相比，Databricks SQL应如何被使用？
exp_zh: Databricks SQL通常作为这些BI工具的补充，用于快速在平台内进行BI工作，而不是完全替代它们。

q: Which approach should be used to connect Databricks to Fivetran for data ingestion?
opts: Use Delta Live Tables to establish a cluster for Fivetran to interact with.
Use Workflows to establish a SQL warehouse (formerly known as a SQL endpoint) for Fivetran to interact with.
Use Partner Connect's automated workflow to establish a SQL warehouse (formerly known as a SQL endpoint) for Fivetran to interact with.
Use Partner Connect's automated workflow to establish a cluster for Fivetran to interact with.
q_zh: 应该使用哪种方法将Databricks连接到Fivetran以进行数据摄取？
exp_zh: Partner Connect的自动化工作流可以为Fivetran建立一个集群来交互。

q: Data professionals with varying titles use the Databricks SQL service as the primary touchpoint with the Databricks Lakehouse Platform. However, some users will use other services like Databricks Machine Learning or Databricks Data Science and Engineering. Which role uses Databricks SQL as a secondary service while primarily using one of the other services?
opts: Data engineer
Data analyst
Business analyst
Business intelligence analyst
q_zh: 不同头衔的数据专业人员将Databricks SQL服务作为与Databricks Lakehouse平台的主要接触点。但是，有些用户会使用其他服务，如Databricks Machine Learning或Databricks Data Science and Engineering。哪个角色将Databricks SQL作为次要服务，而主要使用其他服务？
exp_zh: 数据工程师主要使用Databricks Data Science and Engineering进行数据管道开发，但偶尔也会使用Databricks SQL进行查询。

q: A data analyst has set up a SQL query to run every four hours on a SQL endpoint, but the SQL endpoint is taking too long to start up with each run. Which change can the data analyst make to reduce the start-up time for the endpoint while managing costs?
opts: Reduce the SQL endpoint cluster size
Increase the SQL endpoint cluster size
Turn off the Auto stop feature
Use a Serverless SQL endpoint
q_zh: 一位数据分析师设置了一个SQL查询，每四小时在SQL端点上运行一次，但SQL端点每次启动都需要很长时间。在管理成本的同时，分析师可以做哪些更改来减少端点的启动时间？
exp_zh: 使用Serverless SQL端点可以消除启动延迟，因为Serverless计算资源是即时可用的。

q: A data engineering team has created a Structured Streaming pipeline that processes data in micro-batches and populates gold-level tables. The microbatches are triggered every minute. A data analyst has created a dashboard based on this gold-level data. The project stakeholders want to see the results in the dashboard updated within one minute or less of new data becoming available within the gold-level tables. What cautions should the data analyst share prior to setting up the dashboard to complete this task?
opts: The required compute resources could be costly.
The gold-level tables are not appropriately clean for business reporting.
The streaming data is not an appropriate data source for a dashboard.
The dashboard cannot be refreshed that quickly.
q_zh: 一个数据工程团队创建了一个结构化流管道，以微批处理方式处理数据并填充gold层表。微批处理每分钟触发一次。数据分析师基于这些gold层数据创建了一个仪表板。项目利益相关者希望在新数据进入gold层表后一分钟或更短时间内看到仪表板中的结果。在设置仪表板以完成此任务之前，数据分析师应该分享哪些注意事项？
exp_zh: 要实现每分钟刷新，仪表板需要频繁查询，可能导致计算资源成本高昂。

q: Which approach should be used to ingest data directly from cloud-based object storage?
opts: Create an external table while specifying the DBFS storage path to FROM.
Create an external table while specifying the object storage path to FROM.
Create an external table while specifying the DBFS storage path to PATH.
Create an external table while specifying the object storage path to LOCATION.
q_zh: 应该使用哪种方法直接从基于云的对象存储中摄取数据？
exp_zh: 创建外部表时，使用LOCATION关键字指定云对象存储的路径。

q: A data analyst wants to create a dashboard with three main sections: Development, Testing, and Production. The data analyst wants all three sections on the same dashboard, but wants to clearly designate the sections using text on the dashboard. Which tool can the data analyst use to designate the Development, Testing, and Production sections using text?
opts: Separate endpoints for each section
Separate queries for each section
Markdown-based text boxes
Direct text written into the dashboard in editing mode
q_zh: 一位数据分析师想要创建一个包含三个主要部分的仪表板：开发、测试和生产。分析师希望这三个部分在同一仪表板上，但希望通过仪表板上的文字明确标注这些部分。分析师可以使用哪种工具来用文字标注开发、测试和生产部分？
exp_zh: Databricks SQL仪表板支持基于Markdown的文本框，可以添加标题、说明等文本来分隔区域。

q: A data analyst needs to use the Databricks Lakehouse Platform to quickly create SQL queries and data visualizations. It is a requirement that the compute resources in the platform can be made serverless, and it is expected that data visualizations can be placed within a dashboard. Which Databricks Lakehouse Platform service/capability meets all of these requirements?
opts: Tableau
Delta Lake
Databricks Notebooks
Databricks SQL
q_zh: 一位数据分析师需要使用Databricks Lakehouse平台快速创建SQL查询和数据可视化。要求平台的计算资源可以是无服务器的，并且期望可以将数据可视化放在仪表板中。哪个Databricks Lakehouse平台服务/功能满足所有这些要求？
exp_zh: Databricks SQL提供了无服务器计算选项，支持SQL查询和创建仪表板。

q: A data analyst is attempting to drop a table my_table. The analyst wants to delete all table metadata and data. They run the following command: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS my_table; While the object no longer appears when they run SHOW TABLES, the data files still exist. What describes why the data files still exist and the metadata files were deleted?
opts: The table was managed.
The table did not have a location.
The table was external.
The table's data was smaller than 10 GB.
q_zh: 一位数据分析师试图删除表my_table。分析师想要删除所有表元数据和数据。他们运行以下命令：DROP TABLE IF EXISTS my_table; 虽然运行SHOW TABLES时对象不再出现，但数据文件仍然存在。为什么数据文件仍然存在而元数据文件被删除？
exp_zh: 对于外部表，DROP TABLE只删除元数据，而实际数据文件保留在外部位置。

q: After running DESCRIBE EXTENDED accounts.customers;, the following was returned: Now, a data analyst runs the following command: DROP accounts.customers; Which describes the result of running this command?
opts: Running SELECT * FROM delta.`dbfs:/stakeholders/customers` results in an error.
Running SELECT * FROM accounts.customers will return all rows in the table.
The accounts.customers table is removed from the metastore, but the underlying data files are untouched.
The accounts.customers table is removed from the metastore, and the underlying data files are deleted.
q_zh: 在运行 DESCRIBE EXTENDED accounts.customers; 之后，返回了图片所示信息。现在，数据分析师运行命令：DROP accounts.customers; 运行此命令的结果是什么？
exp_zh: 图片显示该表的 Location 指向外部路径，说明是外部表，因此 DROP 只会移除 metastore 中的元数据，数据文件保留。

q: What should data analysts consider when working with personally identifiable information (PII) data?
opts: The legal requirements for the area in which the data was collected
The organization-specific best practices for PII data
All of these considerations
The legal requirements for the area in which the analysis is being performed
q_zh: 在处理个人身份信息（PII）数据时，数据分析师应该考虑什么？
exp_zh: 处理PII数据时，必须同时考虑数据收集地的法律要求、分析执行地的法律要求以及组织特定的最佳实践。

q: Delta Lake stores table data as a series of data files, but it also stores a lot of other information. What is stored alongside data files when using Delta Lake?
opts: Owner account information
Table metadata, data summary visualizations, and owner account information
Table metadata
Data summary visualizations
q_zh: Delta Lake将表数据存储为一系列数据文件，但它还存储许多其他信息。使用Delta Lake时，除了数据文件之外还存储了什么？
exp_zh: Delta Lake存储表元数据（如事务日志、模式、属性）以及数据文件。

q: Which of the following is an advantage of using a Delta Lake-based data lakehouse over common data lake solutions?
opts: ACID transactions
Flexible schemas
Open-source formats
Scalable storage
q_zh: 与常见数据湖解决方案相比，使用基于Delta Lake的数据湖仓一体有哪些优势？
exp_zh: Delta Lake为数据湖带来了ACID事务、模式强制、时间旅行等功能，这是传统数据湖所缺乏的。

q: Which benefit of using Databricks SQL is provided by Data Explorer?
opts: It can be used to connect to third party BI tools.
It can be used to view metadata and data, as well as view/change permissions.
It can be used to produce dashboards that allow data exploration.
It can be used to make visualizations that can be shared with stakeholders.
q_zh: Data Explorer提供的使用Databricks SQL的好处是什么？
exp_zh: Data Explorer是Databricks SQL中用于浏览数据对象、查看元数据、数据预览和管理权限的工具。

q: The stakeholders.customers table has 15 columns and 3,000 rows of data. The following command is run: After running SELECT * FROM stakeholders.eur_customers, 15 rows are returned. After the command executes completely, the user logs out of Databricks. What is the status of the stakeholders.eur_customers view after logging back in two days later?
opts: The view is not available in the metastore, but the underlying data can be accessed with SELECT * FROM delta.`stakeholders.eur_customers`.
The view remains available but attempting to SELECT from it results in an empty result set because data in views are automatically deleted after logging out.
The view remains available and SELECT * FROM stakeholders.eur_customers will execute correctly.
The view has been dropped.
q_zh: stakeholders.customers表有15列和3000行数据。运行了如下命令（见图）。运行SELECT * FROM stakeholders.eur_customers后，返回15行。命令完全执行后，用户注销了Databricks。两天后重新登录，stakeholders.eur_customers视图的状态是什么？
exp_zh: 命令中创建的是临时视图，临时视图仅在当前会话中有效，用户注销后会被自动删除。

q: A data analyst created and is the owner of the managed table my_table. The data analyst now wants to change ownership of the table to a single other user using Data Explorer. Which approach can the analyst use to complete the task?
opts: Edit the Owner field in the table page by selecting the new owner's account.
Edit the Owner field in the table page by selecting the Admins group.
Edit the Owner field in the table page by selecting All Users.
Edit the Owner field in the table page by removing their own account.
q_zh: 一位数据分析师创建了托管表my_table并是其所有者。现在，分析师想使用Data Explorer将表的所有权更改为另一个单个用户。分析师可以使用哪种方法完成此任务？
exp_zh: 在Data Explorer中，表的所有者字段可以直接编辑，选择新用户的账户即可更改所有权。

q: A data analyst has a managed table table_name in database database_name. The data analyst wants to remove the table from the database and all of the data files associated with the table. The rest of the tables in the database must continue to exist. Which command can the analyst use to complete the task without producing an error?
opts: DROP TABLE table_name FROM database_name;
DROP TABLE database_name.table_name;
DELETE TABLE database_name.table_name;
DELETE TABLE table_name FROM database_name;
q_zh: 数据分析师在数据库database_name中有一个托管表table_name。分析师希望从数据库中删除该表及其所有关联的数据文件，而数据库中的其他表必须继续存在。分析师可以使用哪个命令完成任务而不产生错误？
exp_zh: 正确的语法是DROP TABLE database_name.table_name; 这会删除托管表的元数据和数据。

q: A data analyst runs the following command: Which table represents the output of this command?
opts: data:image/png;base64,

data:image/png;base64,

data:image/png;base64,

data:image/png;base64,
q_zh: 一位数据分析师运行以下命令（见图）。哪个表格代表了该命令的输出？
exp_zh: 根据图片内容，选项D正确匹配了命令的输出结果。

q: A data analyst runs the following command: INSERT INTO stakeholders.suppliers TABLE stakeholders.new_suppliers; What is the result of running this command?
opts: The suppliers table now contains both the data it had before the command was run and the data from the new_suppliers table, including any duplicate data.
The suppliers table now contains both the data it had before the command was run and the data from the new_suppliers table, and any duplicate data is deleted.
The suppliers table now contains only the data from the new_suppliers table.
The suppliers table now contains the data from the new_suppliers table, and the new_suppliers table now contains the data from the suppliers table.
q_zh: 数据分析师运行以下命令：INSERT INTO stakeholders.suppliers TABLE stakeholders.new_suppliers; 运行此命令的结果是什么？
exp_zh: INSERT INTO ... TABLE语句将new_suppliers表中的所有行追加到suppliers表中，不会检查重复，因此包括重复数据。

q: A data analyst is working with a nested array column products in table transactions. The analyst wants to expand the table so each unique item in products for each row has its own row where the transaction_id column is duplicated as necessary. The data analyst is using the following incomplete command: Which line of code should the data analyst use to fill in the blank in the above code block so that it successfully completes the task?
opts: array distinct(products)
explode(products)
flatten(products)
array(products)
q_zh: 数据分析师正在处理表transactions中的嵌套数组列products。分析师希望展开表，使得每行中products的每个唯一项都有一行，其中transaction_id列根据需要重复。数据分析师使用以下不完整的命令：应该使用哪行代码填充空白以成功完成任务？
exp_zh: 使用explode函数可以将数组列展开为多行，每个数组元素生成一行，并复制其他列。

q: A data analysis team is working with the table_bronze SQL table as a source for one of its most complex projects. A stakeholder of the project notices that some of the downstream data is duplicative. The analysis team identifies table_bronze as the source of the duplication. Which of the following queries can be used to deduplicate the data from table_bronze and write it to a new table table_silver?
opts: CREATE TABLE table_silver AS SELECT DISTINCT * FROM table_bronze;
INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE table_silver SELECT * FROM table_bronze;
CREATE TABLE table_silver AS MERGE DEDUPLICATE * FROM table_bronze;
INSERT INTO TABLE table_silver SELECT * FROM table_bronze;
q_zh: 一个数据分析团队正在使用table_bronze SQL表作为其最复杂项目之一的源。项目的一位利益相关者注意到一些下游数据是重复的。分析团队确定table_bronze是重复的来源。以下哪个查询可用于从table_bronze中去除重复数据并将其写入新表table_silver？
exp_zh: SELECT DISTINCT * 可以去除所有列重复的行。CREATE TABLE AS SELECT 会创建新表并写入去重后的数据。

q: A business analyst has been asked to create a data entity/object called sales_by_employee. It should always stay up-to-date when new data are added to the sales table. The new entity should have the columns sales_person, which will be the name of the employee from the employees table, and sales, which will be all sales for that particular sales person. Both the sales table and the employees table have an employee_id column that is used to identify the sales person. Which of the following code blocks will accomplish this task?
opts: data:image/png;base64,

data:image/png;base64,

data:image/png;base64,

data:image/png;base64,
q_zh: 业务分析师被要求创建一个名为sales_by_employee的数据实体/对象。它应该在向sales表添加新数据时始终保持最新。新实体应包含两列：sales_person（来自employees表的员工姓名）和sales（该销售人员的所有销售额）。sales表和employees表都有一个employee_id列用于标识销售人员。以下哪个代码块可以完成此任务？
exp_zh: 需要创建一个视图或表，通过JOIN连接两个表，并计算每个销售人员的总销售额。选项D使用了CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW，并正确进行了JOIN和GROUP BY，确保视图始终反映最新数据。

q: A data analyst has been asked to use the below table sales_table to get the percentage rank of products within region by the sales: The result of the query should look like this: Which query will accomplish this task?
opts: data:image/png;base64,

data:image/png;base64,

data:image/png;base64,

data:image/png;base64,
q_zh: 数据分析师被要求使用下表sales_table按区域获取产品的销售额百分比排名：查询的结果应如下所示：哪个查询将完成此任务？
exp_zh: 要计算百分比排名，可以使用窗口函数PERCENT_RANK()，并按区域分区（PARTITION BY region），按销售额排序。选项B正确使用了PERCENT_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY region ORDER BY sales)。

q: In which situation should a data analyst use higher-order functions?
opts: When custom logic needs to be applied to simple, unnested data
When custom logic needs to be converted to Python-native code
When custom logic needs to be applied at scale to array data objects
When built-in functions are taking too long to perform tasks
q_zh: 在哪种情况下数据分析师应该使用高阶函数？
exp_zh: 高阶函数（如transform、filter、exists）用于处理复杂数据类型，特别是数组（array）和映射（map）。当需要对数组中的每个元素应用逻辑时，高阶函数非常有用。

q: Consider the following two statements: Statement 1: Statement 2: How will the result sets differ for each statement when they are run in Databricks SQL?
opts: The first statement will return all data from the customers table and matching data from the orders table. The second statement will return all data from the orders table and matching data from the customers table. Any missing data will be filled in with NULL.

When the first statement is run, only rows from the customers table that have at least one match with the orders table on customer_id will be returned. When the second statement is run, only those rows in the customers table that do not have at least one match with the orders table on customer_id will be returned.

When the first statement is run, all rows from the customers table will be returned and only the customer_id from the orders table will be returned. When the second statement is run, only those rows in the customers table that do not have at least one match with the orders table on customer_id will be returned.
Both statements will fail because Databricks SQL does not support those join types.
q_zh: 考虑以下两个语句：语句1：语句2：在Databricks SQL中运行这两个语句时，结果集将有何不同？
exp_zh: 语句1是LEFT SEMI JOIN，它只返回左表（customers）中在右表（orders）中有匹配的行。语句2是LEFT ANTI JOIN，它只返回左表中没有匹配的行。

q: A data analyst has created a user-defined function using the following line of code: CREATE FUNCTION price(spend DOUBLE, units DOUBLE) RETURNS DOUBLE RETURN spend / units; Which code blocks can be used to apply this function to the customer_spend and customer_units columns of the table customer_summary to create column customer_price?
opts: SELECT PRICE customer_spend, customer_units AS customer_price FROM customer_summary
SELECT price(customer_spend, customer_units) AS customer_price FROM customer_summary
SELECT function(price(customer_spend, customer_units)) AS customer_price FROM customer_summary
SELECT double(price(customer_spend, customer_units)) AS customer_price FROM customer_summary
q_zh: 数据分析师使用以下代码创建了一个用户定义函数：CREATE FUNCTION price(spend DOUBLE, units DOUBLE) RETURNS DOUBLE RETURN spend / units; 哪个代码块可用于将此函数应用于表customer_summary的customer_spend和customer_units列，以创建列customer_price？
exp_zh: 调用UDF的语法是函数名(参数)。因此正确写法是price(customer_spend, customer_units)，并用AS重命名结果列。

q: A data analyst has been asked to count the number of customers in each region and has written the following query: If there is a mistake in the query, what characterizes the mistake?
opts: The query is using count(*), which will count all the customers in the customers table, no matter the region.
The query is missing a GROUP BY region clause.
The query is using ORDER BY, which is not allowed in an aggregation.
The query is selecting region, but region should only occur in the ORDER BY clause.
q_zh: 数据分析师被要求统计每个区域的客户数量，并编写了以下查询：如果查询中有错误，该错误的特征是什么？
exp_zh: 该查询选择了region和count(*)，但没有GROUP BY子句。在SQL中，如果SELECT中包含非聚合列，则必须使用GROUP BY。因此缺少GROUP BY region。

q: A data analyst is processing a complex aggregation on a table with zero null values and their query returns the following result: Which query does the analyst need to run in order to obtain the above result?
q_zh: 数据分析师正在对一个没有空值的表进行复杂聚合，查询返回以下结果：分析师需要运行哪个查询才能获得上述结果？
exp_zh: 结果显示了按region分组，并计算了每个region的sum(sales)和avg(sales)。选项D正确使用了GROUP BY region和聚合函数SUM和AVG。

q: Which of the following is a benefit of Databricks SQL using ANSI SQL as its standard SQL dialect?
opts: It is more compatible with Spark's interpreters.
It is easy to migrate existing SQL queries to Databricks SQL.
It allows for the use of Photon's computation optimizations.
It is more performant than other SQL dialects.
q_zh: Databricks SQL使用ANSI SQL作为其标准SQL方言的好处是什么？
exp_zh: 采用ANSI SQL标准使得从其他数据库迁移SQL查询变得容易，因为大多数SQL都遵循ANSI标准。

q: How can a data analyst determine if query results were pulled from the cache?
opts: Go to the Query History tab and click on the text of the query. The slideout shows if the results came from the cache.
Go to the Data tab and click Last Query. The details of the query will show if the results came from the cache.
Go to the Queries tab and click on Cache Status. The status will be green if the results from the last run came from the cache.
Go to the SQL Warehouse (formerly SQL Endpoints) tab and click on Cache. The Cache file will show the contents of the cache.
q_zh: 数据分析师如何确定查询结果是否来自缓存？
exp_zh: 在Databricks SQL中，可以在Query History中查看查询的详细信息，弹出的面板会显示结果是否来自缓存。

q: Which statement about a refresh schedule is incorrect?
opts: A query being refreshed on a schedule does not use a SQL Warehouse (formerly known as SQL Endpoint).
Refresh schedules can be configured in the Query Editor.
A query can be refreshed anywhere from 1 minute to 2 weeks.
You must have workspace administrator privileges to configure a refresh schedule.
q_zh: 关于刷新计划的哪个说法是错误的？
exp_zh: 刷新计划中的查询需要使用SQL Warehouse来执行，因此A错误。其他选项正确：可以在Query Editor中配置刷新计划，刷新间隔可以是1分钟到2周，并且需要工作区管理员权限。

q: A data analyst creates a Databricks SQL Query where the result set has the following schema: region STRING number_of_customer INT. What type of visualization will be selected by default when the analyst clicks on the "Add visualization" button on the SQL Editor page?
opts: Violin Chart
Line Chart
Bar Chart
Histogram
q_zh: 数据分析师创建了一个Databricks SQL查询，结果集具有以下模式：region STRING, number_of_customer INT。当分析师单击SQL Editor页面上的“Add visualization”按钮时，默认会选择哪种可视化类型？
exp_zh: 对于包含一个类别列和一个数值列的结果集，默认的可视化通常是条形图（Bar Chart）。

q: A data analyst has created a Query in Databricks SQL, and now wants to create two data visualizations from that Query and add both of those data visualizations to the same Databricks SQL Dashboard. Which step will the data analyst need to take when creating and adding both data visualizations to the Databricks SQL Dashboard?
opts: Decide on a single data visualization to add to the dashboard.
Alter the Query to return two separate sets of results.
Add two separate visualizations to the dashboard based on the same Query.
Copy the Query and create one data visualization per query.
q_zh: 数据分析师在Databricks SQL中创建了一个查询，现在想从该查询创建两个数据可视化，并将这两个可视化添加到同一个Databricks SQL仪表板中。在创建和将两个数据可视化添加到仪表板时，分析师需要采取哪个步骤？
exp_zh: 基于同一个查询可以创建多个不同的可视化，然后分别添加到仪表板中。不需要复制查询或更改查询。

q: A data analyst has been asked to provide a list of options on how to share a dashboard with a client. It is a security requirement that the client does not gain access to any other information, resources, or artifacts in the database. Which approach cannot be used to share the dashboard and meet the security requirement?
opts: Set a refresh schedule for the dashboard and enter the client's email address in the "Subscribers" box.
Download the Dashboard as a PDF and share it with the client.
Generate a Personal Access Token that is good for 1 day and share it with the client.
Take a screenshot of the dashboard and share it with the client.
q_zh: 数据分析师被要求提供如何与客户共享仪表板的选项列表。安全要求是客户不能访问数据库中的任何其他信息、资源或工件。哪种方法不能用于共享仪表板并满足安全要求？
exp_zh: 共享Personal Access Token会使客户能够通过API访问Databricks，可能获取更多信息，不符合安全要求。

q: A data analyst has been asked to produce a visualization that shows the flow of users through a website. What kind of tool is utilized for visualizing this type of flow?
opts: Pivot Table
Heatmap
Sankey
Choropleth
q_zh: 数据分析师被要求制作一个可视化，显示用户通过网站的流程。用于可视化这种流程的工具是什么？
exp_zh: Sankey图用于展示流量或能量流，非常适合显示用户路径。

q: A data analyst writes a query that contains a query parameter. The data analyst then adds an area chart visualization to the query. While adding the area chart visualization to a dashboard, the analyst chooses "Dashboard Parameter" for the query parameter associated with the area chart. Which statement is correct?
opts: The area chart will use whatever is selected in the Dashboard Parameter while all of the other visualizations will remain changed regardless of their parameter use.
The area chart will use whatever is selected in the Dashboard Parameter along with all of the other visualizations in the dashboard that use the same parameter.
The area chart will use whatever value is chosen on the dashboard at the time the area chart is added to the dashboard.
The area chart will use whatever value is input by the analyst when the visualization is added to the dashboard. The parameter cannot be changed by the user afterwards.
q_zh: 数据分析师编写了一个包含查询参数的查询。然后，分析师向该查询添加了一个面积图可视化。在将面积图可视化添加到仪表板时，分析师为与该面积图关联的查询参数选择了“Dashboard Parameter”。哪个陈述是正确的？
exp_zh: 当选择“Dashboard Parameter”时，该可视化将使用仪表板级别定义的参数值，并且所有使用相同参数的可视化都会联动。

q: A data analyst has been asked to configure an alert for a query that returns the income in the accounts_receivable table for a date range. The date range is configurable using a Date query parameter. The Alert does not work. What explains the failure of the Alert to function?
opts: The wrong query parameter is being used. Alerts only work with dropdown list query parameters, not dates.
Queries that use query parameters cannot be used with Alerts.
Queries that return results based on dates cannot be used with Alerts.
The wrong query parameter is being used. Alerts only work with Date and Time query parameters.
q_zh: 数据分析师被要求为查询配置一个警报，该查询返回指定日期范围内accounts_receivable表的收入。日期范围使用日期查询参数配置。警报不起作用。什么解释了警报无法工作的原因？
exp_zh: 在Databricks SQL中，包含查询参数的查询不能用于设置警报。警报只能用于没有参数的静态查询。

q: Which statements about adding visual appeal to visualizations in the Visualization Editor is incorrect?
opts: Visualization scale can be changed.
Data Labels can be formatted.
Tooltips can be formatted.
Borders can be added.
q_zh: 关于在可视化编辑器中增加视觉吸引力的陈述，哪一个是错误的？
exp_zh: 在Databricks SQL的可视化编辑器中，可以更改比例、格式化数据标签和工具提示，但不能添加边框。

q: A consultant has assigned a number of tasks to a data team that must be completed using the Databricks Lakehouse Platform. Which Databricks SQL projects need to be finished?
opts: Testing the quality of data as it is imported from a source
Automating complex notebook-based workflows with multiple tasks
Combining two data sources into a single, comprehensive dataset
Segmenting customers into like groups using a clustering algorithm
q_zh: 顾问向数据团队分配了许多任务，这些任务必须使用Databricks Lakehouse平台完成。哪些Databricks SQL项目需要完成？
exp_zh: Databricks SQL主要用于查询、转换和组合数据。将两个数据源组合成一个综合数据集是典型的SQL项目。

q: A data organization has a team of engineers developing data pipelines following the medallion architecture using Delta Live Tables. While the data analysis team working on a project is using gold-layer tables from these pipelines, they need to perform some additional processing of these tables prior to performing their analysis. Which term is applied to this kind of work?
opts: Data blending
Data enhancement
Data testing
Last-mile ETL
q_zh: 一个数据组织有一个工程师团队，使用Delta Live Tables按照Medallion架构开发数据管道。而一个项目上的数据分析团队正在使用这些管道中的gold层表，他们需要在进行分析之前对这些表进行一些额外的处理。这种工作属于哪个术语？
exp_zh: 在分析之前对已经处理过的表进行的额外转换通常称为“Last-mile ETL”，即最后一英里ETL。

q: Which statement describes descriptive statistics?
opts: A branch of statistics that uses summary statistics to categorically describe and summarize data.
A branch of statistics that uses a variety of data analysis techniques to infer properties of an underlying distribution of probability.
A branch of statistics that uses quantitative variables that must take on a finite or countably infinite set of values.
A branch of statistics that uses summary statistics to quantitatively describe and summarize data.
q_zh: 哪个陈述描述了描述性统计？
exp_zh: 描述性统计使用汇总统计（如均值、中位数、标准差）来定量地描述和总结数据。

q: In which circumstance will there be a substantial difference between the variable's mean and median values?
opts: When the variable contains no outliers
When the variable contains a lot of extreme outliers
When the variable is of the categorical type
When the variable is of the boolean type
q_zh: 在哪种情况下变量的均值和中间值会有显著差异？
exp_zh: 当数据包含极端异常值时，均值会被拉向异常值，而中间值不受影响，因此两者差异较大。

q: A data analyst is working with gold-layer tables to complete an ad-hoc project. A stakeholder has provided the analyst with an additional dataset that can be used to augment the gold-layer tables already in use. Which term is used to describe this data augmentation?
opts: Data enhancement
Ad-hoc improvements
Last-mile dashboarding
Last-mile ETL
q_zh: 数据分析师正在使用gold层表完成一个临时项目。一位利益相关者向分析师提供了一个额外的数据集，可用于增强已在使用的gold层表。哪个术语用于描述这种数据增强？
exp_zh: 向现有数据集添加额外信息以丰富数据称为数据增强（Data enhancement）。

q: A data analyst needs to query the data in my_table. They want to return the values in columns user_id and email_address where records fit the following filter criteria: age is greater than 25 and country is Canada. The analyst does not want to return values from any other columns. Which code block will accomplish the above task?
opts: SELECT * FROM my_table WHERE age > 25 AND country = 'Canada';
SELECT user_id, email_address FROM my_table WHERE age > 25 AND country = 'Canada';
SELECT age, country FROM my_table WHERE age > 25 AND country = 'Canada';
SELECT user_id, email_address FROM my_table WHERE age = 25 AND country > 'Canada';
q_zh: 数据分析师需要查询my_table中的数据。他们希望返回列user_id和email_address的值，其中记录符合以下筛选条件：年龄大于25且国家为加拿大。分析师不想返回任何其他列的值。哪个代码块将完成上述任务？
exp_zh: 正确选项是B，它选择了所需的两列，并应用了正确的WHERE条件。

q: Which example of data projects represents a common analytics application to be completed in Databricks SQL?
opts: Augmenting gold-layer tables with additional external information
Automating complex notebook-based workflows with multiple tasks
Testing the quality of data as it is imported from a source
Segmenting customers into like groups using a clustering algorithm
q_zh: 哪个数据项目示例代表了要在Databricks SQL中完成的常见分析应用程序？
exp_zh: Databricks SQL通常用于查询和转换结构化数据，以及通过外部数据增强现有表。

q: What is a benefit of using Databricks SQL for business intelligence (BI) analytics projects instead of using third-party BI tools?
opts: Computations, data, and analytical tools on the same platform
Advanced dashboarding capabilities
Simultaneous multi-user support
Automated alerting systems
q_zh: 在商业智能分析项目中使用Databricks SQL而不是第三方BI工具有什么好处？
exp_zh: Databricks SQL将计算、数据和数据分析工具集成在同一平台上，减少了数据移动，提高了效率。

q: A data analyst wants the following output: Which statement will produce this output?
q_zh: 数据分析师想要以下输出：哪个语句将产生此输出？
exp_zh: 输出显示每个客户的总订单数。因此需要按客户分组，并计数订单。选项D正确使用了GROUP BY customer_name和COUNT(order_id)。

q: What is an advantage of using a Delta Lake-based data lakehouse over classic enterprise data warehouse solutions?
opts: Open-source formats
Schema enforcement
ACID transactions
Generic optimizations
q_zh: 与经典企业数据仓库解决方案相比，使用基于Delta Lake的数据湖仓一体有什么优势？
exp_zh: Delta Lake基于开源格式（如Parquet），避免了供应商锁定，而传统数据仓库通常使用专有格式。

q: Query History provides Databricks SQL users with a lot of benefits. A data analyst has been asked to share all of these benefits with their team as part of a training exercise. One of the benefit statements the analyst provided to their team is incorrect. Which statement about Query History is incorrect?
opts: It can be used to troubleshoot slow running queries.
It can be used to view the query plan of queries that have run.
It can be used to debug queries.
It can be used to automate query execution on multiple warehouses (formerly endpoints).
q_zh: Query History为Databricks SQL用户提供了许多好处。数据分析师被要求在一次培训中向团队分享所有这些好处。分析师提供给团队的好处陈述中有一个是错误的。关于Query History的哪个陈述是错误的？
exp_zh: Query History可以用于故障排查、查看查询计划和调试查询，但不能用于在多个仓库上自动执行查询。

q: A data scientist has asked a data analyst to create histograms for every continuous variable in a data set. The data analyst needs to identify which columns are continuous in the data set. What describes a continuous variable?
opts: A quantitative variable that never stops changing
A quantitative variable that can take on a finite or countably infinite set of values
A quantitative variable that can take on an uncountable set of values
A categorical variable in which the number of categories continues to increase over time
q_zh: 一位数据科学家要求数据分析师为数据集中的每个连续变量创建直方图。数据分析师需要识别数据集中哪些列是连续的。什么描述了连续变量？
exp_zh: 连续变量是可以取无限多值（不可数）的定量变量，例如身高、体重。

q: A data analyst has been asked to use the below table sales_table to rank products within region by the sales: The result of the query should look like this: Which query will accomplish this task?
q_zh: 数据分析师被要求使用下表sales_table按区域对产品按销售额进行排名：查询的结果应如下所示：哪个查询将完成此任务？
exp_zh: 使用窗口函数RANK()，按区域分区，按销售额降序排序。选项D正确使用了RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY region ORDER BY sales DESC)。

q: A database was created in Databricks SQL using the following statement: CREATE SCHEMA accounting LOCATION 'dbfs:/accounting/data'; Where will data for this database be stored?
opts: dbfs:/accounting/data/accounting.db
dbfs:/accounting/data
dbfs:/accounting/data.db
dbfs:/user/hive/warehouse/accounting.db
q_zh: 使用以下语句在Databricks SQL中创建了一个数据库：CREATE SCHEMA accounting LOCATION 'dbfs:/accounting/data'; 这个数据库的数据将存储在哪里？
exp_zh: LOCATION子句指定了数据库的存储路径，因此数据将直接存储在该路径下。

q: A data analyst is processing a complex aggregation on a table with zero null values and the query returns the following result: Which query did the analyst execute in order to get this result?
q_zh: 数据分析师正在对一个没有空值的表进行复杂聚合，查询返回以下结果：分析师执行了哪个查询以获得此结果？
exp_zh: 结果显示了按region分组的总和，以及所有region的总和（total）。这需要使用GROUP BY ROLLUP或CUBE。选项D使用了GROUP BY CUBE (region)，生成了小计和总计。

q: A managed table and an unmanaged (external) table were both created in Databricks SQL, and data were ingested into each table. Later, both tables were dropped. What is the status of data for each of those tables?
opts: The data in both tables were deleted.
The data in the managed table were deleted, and the data in the unmanaged (external) table were left untouched.
The data in the unmanaged (external) table were deleted and the data in the managed table were left untouched, for both tables the metadata was the same.
The data in both tables were left untouched.
q_zh: 在Databricks SQL中创建了一个托管表和一个非托管（外部）表，并向每个表摄入了数据。后来，这两个表都被删除了。每个表的数据状态是什么？
exp_zh: 对于托管表，删除表会同时删除元数据和数据文件。对于外部表，只删除元数据，数据文件保留。

q: Which statement about subqueries is correct?
opts: Subqueries are not available in Databricks SQL.
Subqueries can be used like other user-defined functions to transform data into different data types.
Subqueries can retrieve data without requiring the creation of a table or view.
Subqueries can be used like other built-in functions to transform data into different data types.
q_zh: 关于子查询的哪个陈述是正确的？
exp_zh: 子查询允许在查询内部检索数据，而无需创建表或视图。

q: Which location can be used to determine the owner of a managed table?
opts: Review the Owner field in the table page using Catalog Explorer
Review the Owner field in the database page using Data Explorer
Review the Owner field in the schema page using Data Explorer
Review the Owner field in the table page using the SQL Editor
q_zh: 哪个位置可用于确定托管表的所有者？
exp_zh: 在Databricks中，Catalog Explorer的table页面中有一个Owner字段，显示表的所有者。

q: Which statement about visualizations is true?
opts: All visualizations must use the same data in order to be included in the same Databricks SQL dashboard.
Line charts are the preferred visualization type for categorical data.
Different visualizations can be used to tell different stories about the data.
There is no difference between the bar chart and a histogram in Databricks SQL.
q_zh: 关于可视化的哪个陈述是正确的？
exp_zh: 不同的可视化可以突出数据的不同方面，用于讲述不同的故事。

q: What describes the variance of a set of values?
opts: Variance is a measure of how far a single observed value is from a set of values.
Variance is a measure of how far an observed value is from the variable's maximum or minimum value.
Variance is a measure of central tendency of a set of values.
Variance is a measure of how far a set of values is spread out from the set's central value.
q_zh: 什么描述了一组值的方差？
exp_zh: 方差衡量一组数值与其均值之间的离散程度，即数据分布的广度。

q: Which SQL standards does Databricks SQL use as its default SQL dialect?
opts: Databricks SQL
Spark SQL
ANSI
Delta SQL
q_zh: Databricks SQL使用哪种SQL标准作为其默认SQL方言？
exp_zh: Databricks SQL默认采用ANSI SQL标准，以确保与其他数据库的兼容性。

q: A data analyst is working in an organization that utilizes a multi-hop, medallion architecture. They have been tasked with creating a new Gold table from an existing Silver table. Which query is performing a hop from a Silver table to a Gold table?
q_zh: 数据分析师在一个采用多跳Medallion架构的组织中工作。他们被要求从现有的Silver表创建一个新的Gold表。哪个查询执行了从Silver表到Gold表的跳跃？
exp_zh: Gold表通常包含聚合数据。选项C从cleaned_transactions（Silver表）中按store_id汇总sales，生成store_sales（Gold表）。

q: What is used as a compute resource for Databricks SQL?
opts: Standard clusters
Single-node clusters
SQL warehouses
Downstream BI tools integrated with Databricks SQL
q_zh: 什么用作Databricks SQL的计算资源？
exp_zh: Databricks SQL使用SQL warehouses作为计算资源，专门用于运行SQL查询和仪表板。

q: A data analyst has opened up the SQL Editor page and written a new SQL statement. The data analyst now wants to save that statement to easily refer back to it later to add it to a dashboard. The results of the SQL statement must be able to be displayed as a counter, table, or a data visualization. Which approach should the data analyst use to accomplish this task?
opts: Save the SQL statement as a Dashboard
Save the SQL statement within a Notebook
Save the SQL statement as a Query
Save the SQL statement in the Query History page
q_zh: 数据分析师打开了SQL Editor页面并编写了一个新的SQL语句。分析师现在想要保存该语句，以便以后轻松引用并将其添加到仪表板。SQL语句的结果必须能够以计数器、表格或数据可视化的形式显示。分析师应该使用哪种方法来完成此任务？
exp_zh: 在Databricks SQL中，将SQL语句保存为Query可以重复使用，并可以将其添加到仪表板，生成可视化。

q: A data analyst wants to create a Databricks SQL dashboard with multiple data visualizations and multiple counters. What must be completed before adding the data visualizations and counters to the dashboard?
opts: All data visualizations and counters must be created using Queries.
A SQL warehouse (formerly known as SQL endpoint) must be turned on and selected.
A markdown-based tile must be added to the top of the dashboard displaying the dashboard's name.
The dashboard owner must also be the owner of the queries, data visualizations, and counters.
q_zh: 数据分析师想要创建一个包含多个数据可视化和多个计数器的Databricks SQL仪表板。在将数据可视化和计数器添加到仪表板之前，必须完成什么？
exp_zh: 仪表板中的每个可视化或计数器都基于一个已保存的Query。因此必须先创建这些查询。

q: An analyst has been asked to combine the data in two tables: suppliers and new_suppliers. It's possible that some of the supplier_id values match in both tables, meaning that those particular suppliers have already been added to the suppliers table. If that is the case, the data should be unchanged. Which command will combine the two tables without duplicating the rows with the same supplier_id?
opts: MERGE INTO suppliers USING new_suppliers ON suppliers.supplier_id = new_suppliers.supplier_id WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT *
COPY INTO suppliers USING new_suppliers ON suppliers.supplier_id = new_suppliers.supplier_id WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT *
UPDATE suppliers USING new_suppliers ON suppliers.supplier_id = new_suppliers.supplier_id WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT *
INSERT INTO suppliers USING new_suppliers ON suppliers.supplier_id = new_suppliers.supplier_id WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT *
q_zh: 分析师被要求合并两个表中的数据：suppliers和new_suppliers。有可能两个表中的一些supplier_id值匹配，这意味着这些供应商已经被添加到suppliers表中。如果是这种情况，数据应该保持不变。哪个命令将合并这两个表而不复制具有相同supplier_id的行？
exp_zh: MERGE INTO语句可以根据条件执行插入或更新。这里只需要插入不匹配的行，因此使用WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT。

q: What does Partner Connect do when connecting Power BI and Tableau?
opts: Creates a Personal Access Token, downloads and installs an ODBC driver, and downloads a configuration file for connection by Power BI or Tableau to a SQL Warehouse (formerly known as a SQL Endpoint).
Creates a Personal Access Token for authentication into Databricks SQL and emails it to you.
Downloads a configuration file for connection by Power BI or Tableau to a SQL Warehouse (formerly known as a SQL Endpoint).
Downloads and installs an ODBC driver.
q_zh: Partner Connect在连接Power BI和Tableau时会做什么？
exp_zh: Partner Connect自动化了连接过程：创建个人访问令牌、下载并安装ODBC驱动程序、下载配置文件。

q: A data analyst is working with a nested array column products in table transactions. The analyst wants to return the first item in the array for each row. The data analyst is using the following incomplete command: Which lines of code should the data analyst use to fill in the blank in the above code block so that it successfully completes the task?
opts: products.1
products.0
products[0]
products[1]
q_zh: 数据分析师正在处理表transactions中的嵌套数组列products。分析师希望返回每行数组中的第一个元素。数据分析师使用以下不完整的命令：应该使用哪行代码填充空白以成功完成任务？
exp_zh: 在Spark SQL中，访问数组元素的语法是array[index]，索引从0开始。因此products[0]返回第一个元素。

q: A dashboard contains a bar chart visualization. The bar chart has a Date widget parameter associated with it. Which statement about the Date widget parameter is true?
opts: The Date widget parameter provides a start date and an end date that is used by a WHERE clause in the query that provides data to the bar chart.
The Date widget parameter provides a start date and an end date that sets the x-axis range of the bar chart.
The Date widget parameter provides a start date and an end date that filters all visualizations in the dashboard.
The Date widget parameter functions only as a text box that tells the dashboard's users what date range the dashboard is using.
q_zh: 仪表板包含一个条形图可视化。该条形图有一个关联的日期小部件参数。关于日期小部件参数，哪个陈述是正确的？
exp_zh: 日期小部件参数用于向查询传递日期范围，通常用于WHERE子句中过滤数据。

q: A data analyst needs to share a Databricks SQL dashboard with stakeholders that are not permitted to have accounts in the Databricks deployment. The stakeholders need to be notified every time the dashboard is refreshed. Which approach can the data analyst use to accomplish this task with minimal effort?
opts: By granting the stakeholders' email addresses permissions to the dashboard
By adding the stakeholders' email addresses to the refresh schedule subscribers list
By granting the stakeholders' email addresses to the SQL Warehouse (formerly known as endpoint) subscribers list
By downloading the dashboard as a PDF and emailing it to the stakeholders each time it is refreshed
q_zh: 数据分析师需要与不允许在Databricks部署中拥有账户的利益相关者共享一个Databricks SQL仪表板。利益相关者需要在每次仪表板刷新时得到通知。分析师可以使用哪种方法以最小努力完成此任务？
exp_zh: 在Databricks SQL中，可以为仪表板设置刷新计划，并将订阅者电子邮件地址添加到订阅列表中，这样每次刷新后会收到包含仪表板快照的邮件。

q: What describes Partner Connect in Databricks?
opts: It allows for free use of Databricks partner tools through a common API.
It allows multi-directional connection between Databricks and Databricks partners easier.
It exposes connection information to third-party tools via Databricks partners.
It is a feature that runs Databricks partner tools on a Databricks SQL Warehouse (formerly known as a SQL Endpoint).
q_zh: 什么描述了Databricks中的Partner Connect？
exp_zh: Partner Connect简化了Databricks与合作伙伴工具之间的连接设置，使其更容易建立双向连接。

q: In which scenario should a data analyst create and use a user-defined function (UDF)?
opts: When the result of logic needs to be restricted to certain users
When logic needs to be deployed within a subquery
When complex logic cannot be implemented with built-in capabilities
When simple logic needs to be optimized for scaling purposes
q_zh: 在哪种情况下，数据分析师应该创建和使用用户定义函数（UDF）？
exp_zh: UDF用于实现内置函数无法完成的复杂逻辑。

q: A data analyst has produced a visualization. A stakeholder has viewed the visualization and is complaining that the visualization is difficult to interpret. After looking at the visualization, the analyst determines that the scale of the y-axis must be changed. Where are the controls for changing the scale of the y-axis in Databricks SQL?
opts: Query Editor -> Y Axis
Dashboard Editor -> Axes -> Y Axis
Visualization Editor -> Y Axis
Settings -> User Settings -> Scaling
q_zh: 数据分析师制作了一个可视化。一位利益相关者查看了该可视化，并抱怨难以理解。分析师查看后，确定必须更改y轴的比例。在Databricks SQL中，更改y轴比例的控制在哪里？
exp_zh: 在可视化编辑器中，可以调整轴的比例、格式等。

q: Which example of data projects represents a common analytics application to be completed in Databricks SQL?
opts: Testing the latency of real-time streaming workloads
Performing analysis-specific ETL on gold-layer tables
Predicting customer churn by automatically developing time-series models
Monitoring the performance of deployed machine learning solutions
q_zh: 哪个数据项目示例代表了要在Databricks SQL中完成的常见分析应用程序？
exp_zh: Databricks SQL常用于对gold层表进行特定于分析的ETL，以准备数据供报告使用。

q: A data analyst has two data sources that are providing similar but complementary information. The analyst wants to combine these sources of data into a single, comprehensive dataset for ongoing use for their team in a variety of different projects. Which term is used to describe this type of work?
opts: Last-mile ETL
Ad-hoc improvements
Data testing
Data blending
q_zh: 一位数据分析师有两个数据源，它们提供相似但互补的信息。分析师希望将这些数据源合并成一个单一的、全面的数据集，供团队在各种不同项目中持续使用。哪个术语用于描述这种类型的工作？
exp_zh: 将多个数据源合并成一个统一数据集的过程称为数据混合（Data blending）。

q: A data analyst has been asked to determine which customers have placed an order in the past year and which customers have not placed an order in the past year. This can be determined with one statement by joining the customers table (which is unique by customer ID) and the orders table. Which type of join should the data analyst use?
opts: Left Semi Join
Left Join
Middle Join
Left Anti Join
q_zh: 数据分析师被要求确定哪些客户在过去一年中下过订单，哪些客户没有下过订单。这可以通过连接customers表和orders表用一个语句来确定。数据分析师应该使用哪种连接类型？
exp_zh: 使用LEFT JOIN可以返回所有客户，并匹配订单信息，通过检查订单列是否为NULL来区分有无订单。

q: A data analyst has come across a column in a table that contains personally identifiable information (PII). The data analyst should not have access to this type of PII data. How should the data analyst proceed?
opts: Stop working with the data and delete the table and any existing metadata or data files.
Stop working with the data and proceed with the project using other data.
Stop working with the data and notify their supervisor to ensure the data is handled following organizational and legal best practices.
Drop the column containing PII data and continue with the project without notifying anybody.
q_zh: 数据分析师在表中发现一个包含个人身份信息（PII）的列。数据分析师不应该访问此类PII数据。数据分析师应该如何处理？
exp_zh: 正确的做法是停止使用该数据，并通知主管，以确保数据按照组织和法律最佳实践处理。

q: A data engineering team has created a Structured Streaming pipeline that processes data in micro-batches and populates gold-level tables. The microbatches are triggered every 10 minutes. A data analyst has created a dashboard based on this gold-level data. The project stakeholders want to see the results in the dashboard updated within 10 minutes or less of new data becoming available within the gold-level tables. What is the ability to ensure the streamed data is included in the dashboard at the standard requested by the project stakeholders?
opts: A refresh schedule with an always-on SQL Warehouse (formerly known as SQL Endpoint)
A refresh schedule with an interval of 10 minutes or less
A refresh schedule with stakeholders included as subscribers
A refresh schedule with a Structured Streaming cluster
q_zh: 一个数据工程团队创建了一个结构化流管道，以微批处理方式处理数据并填充gold层表。微批处理每10分钟触发一次。数据分析师基于这些gold层数据创建了一个仪表板。项目利益相关者希望在新数据进入gold层表后10分钟或更短时间内看到仪表板中的结果。确保流式数据按照项目利益相关者要求的标准包含在仪表板中的能力是什么？
exp_zh: 需要将仪表板的刷新计划设置为每10分钟或更短时间，以匹配流处理的更新频率。

q: Where in the Databricks SQL workspace can a data analyst configure a refresh schedule for a query when the query is not attached to a dashboard or alert?
opts: Data Explorer
The Visualization Editor
The Query Editor
The Dashboard Editor
q_zh: 在Databricks SQL工作区中，当查询未附加到仪表板或警报时，数据分析师可以在哪里配置查询的刷新计划？
exp_zh: 可以在Query Editor中直接为查询设置刷新计划。

q: A stakeholder has provided a data analyst with a lookup dataset in the form of a 50-row CSV file. The data analyst needs to upload this dataset for use as a table in Databricks SQL. Which approach should the data analyst use to quickly upload the file into a table for use in Databricks SQL?
opts: Create a table by uploading the file using the Create page within Databricks SQL.
Create a table via a connection between Databricks and the desktop facilitated by Partner Connect.
Create a table by uploading the file to cloud storage and then importing the data to Databricks.
Create a table by manually copying and pasting the data values into cloud storage and then importing the data to Databricks.
q_zh: 一位利益相关者向数据分析师提供了一个查找数据集，形式为50行的CSV文件。分析师需要上传此数据集，以便在Databricks SQL中用作表。分析师应该使用哪种方法快速将文件上传到表中以供Databricks SQL使用？
exp_zh: Databricks SQL的Create页面允许直接从本地文件上传CSV并创建表，这是最快的方法。

q: Which open-source project helps to enable the data lakehouse by adding organization, reliability, performance, and data governance to data lake architectures?
opts: MLflow
Apache Spark
Delta Lake
Databricks SQL
q_zh: 哪个开源项目通过向数据湖架构添加组织、可靠性、性能和数据治理来帮助实现数据湖仓一体？
exp_zh: Delta Lake是开源存储层，为数据湖带来ACID事务、模式强制、时间旅行等功能，是数据湖仓一体架构的关键组件。

q: Which data visualization use cases is best completed using Databricks SQL relative to other visualization tools?
opts: Presentation-grade visualizations for publication
Organization-branded visualizations for marketing material
Custom, interactive visualizations on small data
Simple, exploratory visualizations on big data
q_zh: 相对于其他可视化工具，哪个数据可视化用例最适合使用Databricks SQL完成？
exp_zh: Databricks SQL擅长对大数据进行快速探索性可视化。

q: A data analyst has written and saved a series of queries that reveal trends that need to be monitored by several stakeholders. Which tool should the data analyst use to share the results of all of the queries to be viewed at once?
opts: A SQL warehouse (formerly known as a SQL endpoint)
A Query History page
A dashboard
A data visualization tab on a Query page
q_zh: 数据分析师编写并保存了一系列查询，这些查询揭示了需要多个利益相关者监控的趋势。分析师应该使用哪种工具来共享所有查询的结果，以便一次性查看？
exp_zh: 仪表板可以将多个查询的可视化组合在一起，方便利益相关者同时查看所有趋势。

q: A data analyst needs to create an empty managed table table_name in database database_name with a specific schema. The table needs to be recreated and empty, regardless of whether or not the table already exists. Which command can the analyst use to complete the task?
opts: CREATE TABLE database_name.table_name USING (width INT, length INT, height INT);
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE database_name.table_name USING (width INT, length INT, height INT);
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE database_name.table_name (width INT, length INT, height INT);
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE table_name FROM database_name USING (width INT, length INT, height INT);
q_zh: 数据分析师需要在数据库database_name中创建一个具有特定模式的空托管表table_name。无论表是否已存在，都需要重新创建该表并使其为空。分析师可以使用哪个命令完成任务？
exp_zh: CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE可以覆盖现有表，语法是CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE table_name (columns)。

q: Data professionals with varying responsibilities use the Databricks Lakehouse Platform. Which role in the Databricks Lakehouse Platform use Databricks SQL as their primary service?
opts: Data scientist
Data engineer
Platform architect
Business analyst
q_zh: 具有不同职责的数据专业人员使用Databricks Lakehouse平台。在Databricks Lakehouse平台中，哪个角色将Databricks SQL作为其主要服务？
exp_zh: 业务分析师通常使用Databricks SQL进行查询、分析和可视化。
